title: FireFist
summary: Measure your power with handheld or wearable.Or break the buildings.
description: With the FireFist, you can measure your punch power.If you have wearable device, play it on yours. firefist is supporting the Android Wear.To enjoy full features. You'll need Google+ account and use Google Play Services.You can break the building, where you close. This mode use GPS, enable the GPS feature.We're wating your reviews.* You can only cracking the building that registered in the server. There are almost buildings in Korea.* Play carefully.
descriptionHTML:
With the FireFist, you can measure your punch power.
If you have wearable device, play it on yours. firefist is supporting the Android Wear.
To enjoy full features. You'll need Google+ account and use Google Play Services.

You can break the building, where you close. This mode use GPS, enable the GPS feature.
We're wating your reviews.

* You can only cracking the building that registered in the server. There are almost buildings in Korea.
* Play carefully.
comments: English Would have given 5 stars if you could get English language.
Good app but wish I could put is in English
recentChanges: Google+ 프로필 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다!
건물 부수기 모드가 생겼습니다. 혹시... 청와대 부수고 싶으세요? ^-^;;(근처에 가서 주먹질을....)
